quote_first: “And now I must dash, Seb. I’m off to see my mother in Yorkshire, and if I don’t leave immediately I’ll miss the
quote_last: to Huddersfield. Do give your mother my kindest regards and wish her luck for the trial.”
title: Mightier Than the Sword
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: On the next day he boarded the London train which reaches Hull at
quote_last: . At Paragon Station he soon singled out Beamish from Merriman’s description.
title: The Pit-Prop Syndicate
author: Freeman Wills Crofts
